plot: Aquarium is a short film about a deaf and mute girl, Emma. Because of her handicap, she lives a secluded life as an artist.
title: Akvarium
plot_es: Aquarium is a short film about a deaf and mute girl, Emma. Because of her handicap, she lives a secluded life as an artist.
plot_en: Aquarium is a short film about a deaf and mute girl, Emma. Because of her handicap, she lives a secluded life as an artist.
